mapper.select: SELECT MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_IMG , TO_CHAR(MOVIE_LIKE_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') MOVIE_LIKE_ENROLL_DATE FROM MOVIE JOIN MOVIE_LIKE USING(MOVIE_NO) WHERE MOVIE_LIKE_DEL_YN = 'N' AND MOVIE_LIKE_DEL_YN = 'N'AND MEMBER_NO =#{memberNo} ORDER BY MOVIE_LIKE_ENROLL_DATE DESC
